short_summary: Bid To Package,Efficient Jubilee Lodges Caravan Park Refurbishment
description: Stay at a stunning seaside park which makes the most of stunning coastal views, a long sandy beach and the sound of waves lapping at the shore. In addition we have an outdoor heated pool, games room, laundry facilities and cafe on site.
